data.fullContent: It is a relatively large species. Females can measure up to 16 cm and are larger than males, which are 14 to 15 cm long. It is a protected species in the UK and Europe. Land development, population growth, and agriculture have disturbed the newt, and it is becoming quite rare.
data.answer: 它是一个相对较大的物种。雌性体长可达16厘米，比雄性体长14至15厘米的体型更大。它是英国和欧洲的受保护物种。土地开发、人口增长和农业已经干扰了蝾螈，并且它变得非常罕见。
